title: Sleep Restoration Tips with TCM
excerpt: Create a calming routine and learn how acupuncture supports deeper, more restful sleep.
author: Dr. Michael Huang
contentMarkdown:
Sleep issues are often linked to stress, overthinking, or an imbalanced routine. TCM addresses both the root and the symptoms.

## Night Routine Checklist

- Dim lights after sunset
- Avoid screens 60 minutes before bed
- Keep consistent sleep times

## Treatment Options

Acupuncture can quiet the mind and regulate hormones that support sleep cycles. Herbal formulas are tailored to your pattern.
